rules: No personal insults, harrassment or overly vulgar language
Personal insults destroy the atmosphere of a healthy debate, and never result in anything but further escalating an exchange of words into a full-fledged argument.
No negative contributions in the form of trolling, overshitposting or spamming
This community aims to be a civil place of discussion. Users who negatively contribute to the conversation by trolling or constantly posting shitposts are not welcome.
We have younger members around, and therefore erotica, pornography and gore are not allowed.
No leaving the bounds of the rules list
There are only {length} rules for the time being. You should not seek more.

easterEggs.11: All your carefully picked arguments can easily be ignored.
easterEggs.11.1: Anything and everything you say, no matter how truthful, __will__ be deemed wrong if the majority disagrees.
easterEggs.12:
Anything and everything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law...

...and on Discord.
easterEggs.34: If it exists, there is porn of it.
easterEggs.35: The exception to rule no. 34 is the citation of rule no. 34.
easterEggs.37: There are no girls on the internet.
easterEggs.38: For every stupid rule, there is a butthurt person.
easterEggs.62: If it exists, it has been pirated.
easterEggs.63: For every given male character, there is a female version of that character.
easterEggs.63.1: For every given female character, there is a male version of that character.
easterEggs.63.2: For every given asexual character, there is a version for each sex.
easterEggs.82: Nobody tells the truth on the internet.

easterEggs.520: Web Server Returned an Unknown Error
